name: Dahlia's Adventure
description:
This Legend of Zelda like game is a solo project made in a week using Pixel Game Maker MV.

You play as Dahlia.  A dark elf who wants to discover the secrets of the legendary Gray Tower.

Please leave feedback.  I know this game isn't polished due to the amount of time spent working on it, but feedback will be greatly appreciated!

This is a Black Streak Entertainment game created by Justin Raimey.  More info on Black Streak Ent can be found on our Patreon https://www.patreon.com/posts/28204364

The music for ver. 1.0 is from Opengameart.org
